questionsList.questionText: What is index of the first pivot after it has been sorted?

questionsList.questionText:
After the pivot is sorted, quicksort is called again, it requires three bits of information, the left and right boundaries of the array being sorted and new pivot point. Keep in mind in this implementation the pivot selected is the value at the right boundary.
What will be the new left and right boundaries and the new pivot when quicksort is called again for the left side of the first pivot after it has been sorted?
Provide an array which uses 4 pivots to be sorted
Write an array in which the third pivot point will be the value 7

ns2:exercise.subTitle: by Jerome Saltmarsh
ns2:exercise.title: Exercise Quick Sort
